Vanity

Source: R/deploy.R
Vanity.Rd

Vanity

Vanity

Details

An R6 class that represents a Vanity URL

See also

Method new()

The Connect instance.

The Content instance.

The vanity data.

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

Arguments

Whether to make a deep clone.
